message.body: I agree. Can't be helped for now.
I didn't know the conditions until I took the job.
I don't think I would have if I did.
...all I'm going to say is don't live with regret man. As long as you can do this and live peacefully that's good. If not then I think you need to start
Honestly, I don't have much to work with right now.
To be honest that wasn't fair to you what they did. I think it's BS that you should have to be honest and they wasn't honest. I would still li be my life
and accept and consequences but you play it safe so I can respect that. I hope you figure something out soon before it's too late...
